content: चर्चा, चर्चिका {@--1@} Repetition, recitation, study, repeated reading, perusal. {@--2@} Discussion, inquiry, investigation. {@--3@} Reflection. {@--4@} Smearing the body with unguents; अंगचर्चामरचयं <ls>K. 157</ls>; श्रीखंडचर्चा विष <ls>Gīt. 9.</ls> {@--5@} An epithet of the goddess Durgā.
